name: LivingAttackEvent
description: LivingAttackEvent is fired when a living Entity is attacked. This event is fired whenever an Entity is attacked in EntityLivingBase.attackEntityFrom(DamageSource, float) and EntityPlayer.attackEntityFrom(DamageSource, float) . This event is fired via the ForgeHooks.onLivingAttack(EntityLivingBase, DamageSource, float) . source contains the DamageSource of the attack. amount contains the amount of damage dealt to the entity. This event is Cancelable . If this event is canceled, the Entity does not take attack damage. This event does not have a result. HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge.EVENT_BUS .
